actions.action: Click on the "Add new brand" button.
Enter the brand name e.g. "Nike" in the "Name" field.
Enter a brand description in the "Description" area.
actions.expectedResult: The complex description of the brand is filled into the rich text editor.

actions.action: Upload a "Logo" image file for the brand.
actions.expectedResult: The "Logo" field displays the name of the selected image file.
A success message "Successful creation" is displayed at the top of the page
